languages.text: "Я там, где требуется гнев Его, что опалит нечестивое, изгонит скверное и очистит скорбные юдоли слуг его".
"I am wherever there is need for His wrath, which scorches the wicked, casts out the profane, and purifies His servants' doleful fate."
languages.original_text: "Я там, где требуется гнев Его, что опалит нечестивое, изгонит скверное и очистит скорбные юдоли слуг его".

traits.locale_text: "I am wherever there is need for His wrath, which scorches the wicked, casts out the profane, and purifies His servants' doleful fate."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am wherever there is need for His wrath, which scorches the wicked, casts out the profane, and purifies His servants' doleful fate."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “哪里需要神皇的愤怒，我就在哪里。祂的愤怒会烧尽一切恶人，驱逐亵渎之物，净化祂的仆人所遭受的悲惨命运。”
languages.original_text: "I am wherever there is need for His wrath, which scorches the wicked, casts out the profane, and purifies His servants' doleful fate."

traits.locale_text: “哪里需要神皇的愤怒，我就在哪里。祂的愤怒会烧尽一切恶人，驱逐亵渎之物，净化祂的仆人所遭受的悲惨命运。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Sa colère consume les félons, bannit les profanes et purifie l'existence autrement funeste de Ses serviteurs. Je n'en suis que la messagère. »
languages.original_text: "I am wherever there is need for His wrath, which scorches the wicked, casts out the profane, and purifies His servants' doleful fate."

traits.locale_text: « Sa colère consume les félons, bannit les profanes et purifie l'existence autrement funeste de Ses serviteurs. Je n'en suis que la messagère. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Voy dondequiera que hace falta la cólera del Emperador, que quema a los malvados, expulsa a los blasfemos y purifica el doloroso destino de sus sirvientes».
languages.original_text: "I am wherever there is need for His wrath, which scorches the wicked, casts out the profane, and purifies His servants' doleful fate."

traits.locale_text: «Voy dondequiera que hace falta la cólera del Emperador, que quema a los malvados, expulsa a los blasfemos y purifica el doloroso destino de sus sirvientes».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「皇帝の怒りが必要とされるなら、私はどこにでもいる。危険人物を焼き、不敬の輩を追放し、彼の従者の悲惨な運命を浄化する」
languages.original_text: "I am wherever there is need for His wrath, which scorches the wicked, casts out the profane, and purifies His servants' doleful fate."

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝の怒りが必要とされるなら、私はどこにでもいる。危険人物を焼き、不敬の輩を追放し、彼の従者の悲惨な運命を浄化する」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich bin dort, wo sein Zorn benötigt wird, sein Zorn, der die Bösen verbrennt, die Profanen verstößt, das traurige Schicksal seiner Diener läutert."
languages.original_text: "I am wherever there is need for His wrath, which scorches the wicked, casts out the profane, and purifies His servants' doleful fate."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin dort, wo sein Zorn benötigt wird, sein Zorn, der die Bösen verbrennt, die Profanen verstößt, das traurige Schicksal seiner Diener läutert."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "I am wherever there is need for His wrath, which scorches the wicked, casts out the profane, and purifies His servants' doleful fate."

languages.text: "Habisleri yakıp kavuran, zındıkları kovan ve hizmetkârlarının acılı kaderlerini pirüpak kılan O'nun gazabına nerede ihtiyaç varsa oradayımdır."
languages.original_text: "I am wherever there is need for His wrath, which scorches the wicked, casts out the profane, and purifies His servants' doleful fate."

traits.locale_text: "Habisleri yakıp kavuran, zındıkları kovan ve hizmetkârlarının acılı kaderlerini pirüpak kılan O'nun gazabına nerede ihtiyaç varsa oradayımdır."
